title: In memories of Tang Chun Fung
description:
Tang Chun Fung
Born on 22 June 1995
Died on 22 Feb 2020
a 22-year-old student of the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, was found dead in the sea near Sai Wan Ho on the morning of November 8, 2019. The cause of death is still unknown. The police are investigating the case. Tang Chun Fung was a student of the Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. He was a member of the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology's Dragon Boat Team. He was also
